subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Sun Ming Ming’s hands are enormous. He catches a basketball with one, as a baseball player might with a mitt. They are hands with the touch of a shooting guard, able to sink one 20-foot jumper after another.
snippet: Sun Ming Ming’s hands are enormous. He catches a basketball with one, as a baseball player might with a mitt. They are hands with the touch of a shooting guard, able to sink one 20-foot jumper after another.
